testimonials.text: Enthusiast person with a great work ethic! will definitely hire him again for my future projects. Finished all the assigned task with great quality and met the deadline.

That Gedeon Eyasu must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
